abstract: Vatican releases paper laying groundwork for discussions on family issues by world's bishops in October, including same-sex unions and divorced Catholics.
lead_paragraph: Bishops are expected to discuss issues like same-sex unions and divorced Catholics at a Vatican meeting in October, while trying to stay true to church doctrine, a new report says.

headline.main: Vatican Lays Groundwork for Discussions on Family
headline.print_headline: Vatican Lays Groundwork for Discussions on Family

snippet: Bishops are expected to discuss issues like same-sex unions and divorced Catholics at a Vatican meeting in October, while trying to stay true to church doctrine, a new report says.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
